passage_text: Meaning of Estefania. Spanish name. In Spanish, the name Estefania means-feminine of stephan.The name Estefania originated as an Spanish name. The name Estefania is most often used as a girl name or female name. Spanish Name Meaning

[ 4 syll. es-te-fa-nia, est-efan-ia ] The baby girl name Estefania is pronounced as EH STehF-AE-NYaa †. Estefania is used mostly in English and Spanish, and it is of Old Greek origin. Estefania is a derivative of the English and German name Stephanie. See also the related form, the Spanish Estefania. estefanía
Estefania /es-te-fa-nia/ [5 sylls.] as a name for girls is of Spanish and Greek origin, and Estefania means garland, crown.
